Package pokemoncardbattle

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • pokemoncardbattle.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This Game class holds the information of the game that will be shown into the main program as the user begins playing the game.
    Author:
    MZT
